Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the situation by suggesting that members of the Muslim community are gathering at the mosque in violation of lockdown rules.
Lack enough support: The claim lacks sufficient evidence or support to prove that the video shows members of the Muslim community gathering at the mosque during the lockdown.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the video depicts a recent event in Ahmedabad's Jamalpur, without providing concrete evidence to support this assumption.
Exist alternative explanation: There is an alternative explanation provided by the expert, stating that the video is from a different location (Dongri) and a different time (March 2020) when the mosque was closed down by the local police.
